Class SimpleCollectionBinder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.binding.DataBinder<java.util.Collection<T>>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleCollectionBinder<T>
extends DataBinder<java.util.Collection<T>>
    A binder for collections of a single type
    Author:
    luis
